verses.name: Matthew 6:1
verses.text: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men, to be seen of them: otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven.

verses.name: Matthew 6:2
verses.text: Therefore when thou doest thine alms, do not sound a trumpet before thee, as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets, that they may have glory of men. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.

verses.name: Matthew 6:3
verses.text: But when thou doest alms, let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth:
